shri lankawe ubhayajiwi namawaliya - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya shri lankawe ubhayajiwi namawaliya (shri lankawe ubhayajiwin layisthuwa wethin yali-yomu karana ladi) shri lankawa ubhayajiwi wishesha 110kata adhika sankhyawak sandaha wasabhawana wana athara, in wishesha 90kata adhika sankhyawak meratata aawenika we.[1]

obata mathaka athi lasantha wikramathunga, eknaligoda wani mini marum wala chodana labanne gotabhayayi mama th awanakawama sithanawa ohu me kriyawalata yam widiyakin sambanda bawa ese unath apa me dewal baliya yuththe sapekshaka lesayi, gotabhaya mulika wi athikala 2009 yuda jayagrahanaye damu aththiwarama akandawa wasara 10 pamana thibuna, enam owunta balaya gilihi wasara 4 k giya thana minisun 360 pamana diwi ahimi karana asthawara thathwayakata rata paminiya, pasugiya dinakadi yahapalana rajaye hamudapathi pawasuwe pasugiya kalaye hamuda buddhi ansha duruwala kirima mita hethu wu bawayi.
